name: Masai
description: Masai is an outcome driven career school. Our mission is to skill India’s untapped & underutilized talent, and to train them for some of the most in-demand jobs in the world. We are introducing a new model of higher education in which we, Masai, invest in our students’ future and success. As India’s fastest growing career institute, Masai has one goal: unlocking the human potential of India by making our education system outcome driven.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Driven By Outcomes To Launch Your Career In Tech
ShortDescription: India’s only outcome-based career institute. Enter the tech workforce industry-ready.

Highlights.name: 100% Live Distance Learning
Highlights.description: India’s Only Live Tech-Learning Course With Tier 1 Instructors.

Highlights.name: Generative AI Integrated Program
Highlights.description: Harness & Implement The Power Of AI In Coding & Data Analytics.

Highlights.name: Industry Ready Curriculum
Highlights.description: Our Curriculum Is Regularly Updated Through Industry Feedback.

enhanced_description: Masai is an outcome-driven career school based in Bangalore, India, established in 2019. Its core mission is to skill India’s untapped and underutilized talent, preparing them for highly in-demand jobs globally, particularly within the tech workforce. The institution operates on a unique Pay-After-Placement (P.A.P.) model, signifying its commitment to student success. Programs are delivered via 100% live distance learning with Tier 1 instructors and are designed to make students industry-ready in just 25-35 weeks. The curriculum is regularly updated based on industry feedback and includes a Generative AI integrated program to harness and implement the power of AI in coding and data analytics.
key_use_cases: Training untapped talent for in-demand tech jobs
Enabling career transformation into the tech workforce
Upskilling in Generative AI for coding and data analytics
competitive_advantages: India's only live tech-learning course with Tier 1 instructors
hr_functions_supported: Talent Acquisition (indirectly, by providing skilled candidates)
roi_benefits: Reduced financial risk for students due to Pay-After-Placement model
Faster entry into the tech workforce (25-35 weeks)
Higher likelihood of successful job placement due to outcome-driven model
Access to industry-ready talent for companies
Addresses skill gaps in the tech industry
primary_users: Individuals seeking career transformation in tech
Untapped and underutilized talent in India
